thread.title: AP PHOTOS: Bosnian promoting 'slow way of life' to artists
thread.title_full: AP PHOTOS: Bosnian promoting 'slow way of life' to artists

title: AP PHOTOS: Bosnian promoting 'slow way of life' to artists
text: > Entertainment AP PHOTOS: Bosnian promoting 'slow way of life' to artists In this photo taken on Saturday, Oct. 3, 2015, Muhamed Mustafa Hamidovic poses for a photo inside an old Bosnian house used for weekend gatherings of artists in the village of Dzafici, 100 kms north of Sarajevo. To allow people a break from their busy lives, Bosnian Rasim Hamidovic, 60, is organising weekend gatherings of various artists in his home in Dzafici to remind them and other villagers of the old way of life in harmony with nature. (AP Photo/Amel Emric)
